mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NO, A.ARTIST_PROFILE, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME FROM ARTIST A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ARTIST_REG = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MEMBER_NO ASC

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO, A.ARTIST_PROFILE, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME, COUNT(F.ARTIST_NO) AS FOLLOW_COUNT FROM ARTIST A LEFT JOIN FOLLOW F ON (A.MEMBER_NO = F.ARTIST_NO ) JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
WHERE M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ARTIST_REG = 'Y' GROUP BY A.MEMBER_NO, A.ARTIST_PROFILE, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_NAME ORDER BY FOLLOW_COUNT DESC

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO, A.ARTIST_PROFILE, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME FROM ARTIST A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
WHERE M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ARTIST_REG = 'Y'

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO, A.ARTIST_PROFILE, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME, LISTAGG(W.WORK_DETAIL, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY W.WORK_DETAIL) AS WORK_DETAILS,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO) AS FOLLOW_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ARTIST_NO = #{artistNo}) AS FOLLOW_CHECK
FROM ARTIST A LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN WORK W ON (A.MEMBER_NO = W.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{artistNo} AND M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY A.MEMBER_NO, A.ARTIST_PROFILE, A.ARTIST_NICKNAME

SELECT P.PIECE_NO, P.PIECE_TITLE, P.SIZE_X, P.SIZE_Y, P.PIECE_RENAME, PS.SELL_PRICE, P.PIECE_STATUS FROM PIECE P LEFT JOIN PIECE_SELL PS ON (P.PIECE_NO = PS.PIECE_NO) WHERE P.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND P.PIECE_STATUS IN ('N', 'F', 'A', 'S') ORDER BY
P.PIECE_TITLE PS.SELL_PRICE P.PIECE_NO
ASC DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PIECE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND PIECE_STATUS IN ('N', 'F', 'A', 'S')
SELECT WORK_DETAIL FROM WORK WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
